REUTERS.UNKNOWN: C M f1380 reute d f BC-LME-LISTS-BRAZILIAN-A 03-31 0045

TEXT.TITLE: LME LISTS BRAZILIAN ALUMINIUM BRAND
TEXT.BODY: The London Metal Exchange (LME) has listed the aluminium brand "CBA' produced by Cia Brasileira de Aluminio at its Mairinque, Sao Paulo, plant. The brand will constitute good delivery from April 1, the LME said. Reuter
